channel.title: Reflection
channel.description: Just recently found out that there is a certain reflection bot for rsce. Me personally didnt know they existed for rsc. Now, the question is, can you do what jagex did, can you stop reflection bots?

item.title: Reflection
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:8, topic:430471”][quote author=imthenull link=topic=533155.msg3903615#msg3903615 date=1327997826]

Because they want money… bots bring profit… look at them now… -million+ a month…

If that were true, then they wouldn’t have done anything about the issue, or threatened people who were affiliated with the botting scene.
[/quote]
Valid point but why didn’t they stop it before? Best Java developers in the world cant stop teenagers? Yea right… they choose to run with the bank. It is obvious.[/quote]So, the general theory is that they wanted to get what they could out of runescape?

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Reflection
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

‘reflection’ doesn’t mean the bot is good and un-stoppable or anything, it’s just like any other bot then. I don’t think we should specifically target a single type of bot, but all of them.

Read full topic
